SEARCH
程序包 com.se.aiconomy.server.handler

类 BudgetRequestHandler

java.lang.Object
com.se.aiconomy.server.handler.BudgetRequestHandler
public class BudgetRequestHandler extends Object
Handles budget-related requests, including adding, removing, updating, retrieving, and analyzing budgets.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    BudgetRequestHandler()
    Constructs a BudgetRequestHandler with a default BudgetService implementation.
    BudgetRequestHandler(BudgetService budgetService)
    Constructs a BudgetRequestHandler with a custom BudgetService.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    BudgetInfo
    handleBudgetAddRequest(BudgetAddRequest request)
    Handles the request to add a new budget.
    Budget.AIAnalysis
    handleBudgetAnalysisRequest(BudgetAnalysisRequest request)
    Handles the request to analyze the budget for a user.
    BudgetInfo
    handleBudgetUpdateRequest(BudgetUpdateRequest request)
    Handles the request to update a budget.
    List<BudgetCategoryInfo>
    handleGetBudgetByCategory(BudgetCategoryInfoRequest request)
    Handles the request to get a list of budgets by category for a user.
    TotalBudgetInfo
    handleGetTotalBudgetRequest(BudgetTotalInfoRequest request)
    Handles the request to get total budget information for a user.
    boolean
    handleRemoveBudgetRequest(BudgetRemoveRequest request)
    Handles the request to remove a budget.

  • 方法详细资料

    • handleBudgetAddRequest

      public BudgetInfo handleBudgetAddRequest(BudgetAddRequest request)
      Handles the request to add a new budget.
      参数:
      request - the request containing budget details
      返回:
      the added budget information

    • handleRemoveBudgetRequest

      public boolean handleRemoveBudgetRequest(BudgetRemoveRequest request)
      Handles the request to remove a budget.
      参数:
      request - the request containing user ID and category to remove
      返回:
      true if the budget was removed successfully, false otherwise

    • handleBudgetUpdateRequest

      public BudgetInfo handleBudgetUpdateRequest(BudgetUpdateRequest request)
      Handles the request to update a budget.
      参数:
      request - the request containing updated budget details
      返回:
      the updated budget information

    • handleGetTotalBudgetRequest

      public TotalBudgetInfo handleGetTotalBudgetRequest(BudgetTotalInfoRequest request)
      Handles the request to get total budget information for a user.
      参数:
      request - the request containing the user ID
      返回:
      the total budget information

    • handleGetBudgetByCategory

      public List<BudgetCategoryInfo> handleGetBudgetByCategory(BudgetCategoryInfoRequest request)
      Handles the request to get a list of budgets by category for a user.
      参数:
      request - the request containing the user ID
      返回:
      the list of budget category information

    • handleBudgetAnalysisRequest

      public Budget.AIAnalysis handleBudgetAnalysisRequest(BudgetAnalysisRequest request)
      Handles the request to analyze the budget for a user.
      参数:
      request - the request containing the user ID
      返回:
      the AI analysis result of the budget
